title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.6 - Responsibility of employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.6 - Responsibility of employees

State Regulations

Every employee shall properly use the protective equipment
provided for his protection and shall comply with all the provisions of this

Part (rule) relating to his personal conduct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
50.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
